Segment.name: MEA
Segment.comment: To specify physical measurements or counts, including dimensions, tolerances, variances, and weights (See Figures Appendix for example of use of C001)

Field.name: MeasurementReferenceIdCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the broad category to which a measurement applies

Field.name: MeasurementQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying a specific product or process characteristic to which a measurement applies

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: RangeMinimum
Field.comment: The value specifying the minimum of the measurement range

Field.name: RangeMaximum
Field.comment: The value specifying the maximum of the measurement range

Field.name: MeasurementSignificanceCode
Field.comment: Code used to benchmark, qualify or further define a measurement value

Field.name: MeasurementAttributeCode
Field.comment: Code used to express an attribute response when a numeric measurement value cannot be determined

Field.name: SurfaceLayerPositionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

Field.name: MeasurementMethodOrDevice
Field.comment: The method or device used to record the measurement

Field.name: CodeListQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a specific industry code list

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

SyntaxNote.name: R03050608
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of MEA03, MEA05, MEA06 or MEA08 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: E0412
SyntaxNote.comment: Only one of MEA04 or MEA12 may be present.

SyntaxNote.name: L050412
SyntaxNote.comment: If MEA05 is present, then at least one of MEA04 or MEA12 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: L060412
SyntaxNote.comment: If MEA06 is present, then at least one of MEA04 or MEA12 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: L07030506
SyntaxNote.comment: If MEA07 is present, then at least one of MEA03, MEA05 or MEA06 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: E0803
SyntaxNote.comment: Only one of MEA08 or MEA03 may be present.

SyntaxNote.name: P1112
SyntaxNote.comment: If either MEA11 or MEA12 is present, then the other is required.
